subject: Using JFC Unit, possible to access a window alread opened?
msgSnippet: I can figure out how to grab a handle on a window I have opened. But I d like to open that window then run the tests (Basically for debugging purposes as it
messageBody:
I can figure out how to grab a handle on a window I have opened. But
I'd like to open that window then run the tests (Basically for
debugging purposes as it takes about 3 minutes for the window to
open...).

It's a swing app. I just can't seem to snag the window.

Any help would be appreciated!

Thanks
